title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Gareth Bale latest
description: All the latest Man Utd transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Monday, January 22.
content: Manchester United will announce the signing of Alexis Sanchez on Monday after pictures emerged on Twitter of what looked to be the Chile international in a club shirt.Sanchez must reportedly wait for the Home Office to update his work permit on Monday, along with Henrikh Mkhitaryan, ahead of his move in the other direction to Arsenal.United face competition from several clubs in the battle to sign Real Madrid star Gareth Bale, according to the Daily Star.Bundesliga giants Bayern Munich are reportedly after the Wales international this summer.Aston Villa are lining up a move for Sam Johnstone's Manchester United team-mate Dean Henderson this summer, according to The Sun.Romelu Lukaku another other United forwards will be left "panicking" after the arrival of Alexis Sanchez, says former Old Trafford midfielder Paul Ince.Ince said: "I would imagine there are some players who are panicking about his arrival."You know what you're getting from Romelu Lukaku. Anthony Martial can do that, when he switches on, which isn't often. Marcus Rashford is still young and doesn't get the game time, but none of those players are on the same level as Sanchez."
